mapper.select: SELECT b.book_id, b.writer_id, b.category_id, b.title, b.status, b.current_sequence, b.max_sequence, b.created_at FROM books b WHERE b.book_id = #{bookId}

SELECT b.book_id, b.writer_id, b.category_id, b.title, b.status, b.current_sequence, b.max_sequence, b.created_at, b.last_writer_user_id AS lastWriterUserId, CAST(NULL AS CHAR) AS myVote FROM books b WHERE b.book_id = #{bookId}

SELECT s.sentence_id, s.sequence_no, s.content, s.writer_id, s.created_at, 0 AS likeCount, 0 AS dislikeCount, CAST(NULL AS CHAR) AS myVote FROM sentences s WHERE s.book_id = #{bookId} ORDER BY s.sequence_no ASC
SELECT b.book_id, b.writer_id, b.category_id, b.title, b.status, b.current_sequence, b.max_sequence, b.created_at FROM books b ORDER BY b.created_at DESC

SELECT s.sentence_id, s.sequence_no, s.content, s.writer_id, s.created_at, s.book_id AS bookId, (SELECT title FROM books b WHERE b.book_id = s.book_id) AS bookTitle, 0 AS likeCount, 0 AS dislikeCount FROM sentences s WHERE s.writer_id = #{writerId} ORDER BY s.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}
